message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"this (refers to something nearby or just mentioned)","sentence":"这是水。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing a glass of water on a table, with a hand gesturing toward it as if introducing it.
